review: I love having a remote that is separate from my phone. however, I was an avid Chromecast user, and still am. I prefer to have volume control, more interaction from my phone, and I am not fond of using directional buttons to log into my various accounts, or search. I really enjoy having a separate interface for the streaming stick. but I'm really sticking to my Chromecast for most of my streaming needs.
